about_the_game: Heads up, this is the description for The Dreamer Must Die's DEMO, go look at the main page for more information.

content_descriptors.notes: The Dreamer Must Die contains dark psychological themes, and may not be appropriate for all audiences.

detailed_description: Heads up, this is the description for The Dreamer Must Die's DEMO, go look at the main page for more information.
legal_notice: The Dreamer Must Die. Copyright 2022, Ahlquist Interactive

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5+ (unless inside the Macbook Air 🔥🔥🔥)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal compatible GPU (2018 forward)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Seriously, the Intel Macbook Air is a toaster.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 11+
  • Processor: Apple M1+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal compatible GPU (2021 forward)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Macbook Air on Apple Silicon should be good.

name: The Dreamer Must Die Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz base clock or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel Iris Xe Graphics tested on an i7-11370H mobile CPU at 1080p. Disk space is an approximation, more space may be required in future updates.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.6GHz base clock or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk space is an approximation, more space may be required in future updates.

short_description: 'The Dreamer Must Die' is an RPG shooter where you're the only hope for a fading dream world. Advance the story, find new equipment, and improve your character within the MIND menu to ensure your survival. This is the demo for that game.
